name: Sri Selliah Memorial Trust
briefDescription: The main activities of our organization is 1. Sri Selliah Memorial School for Mentally challenged children:25 Mentally Challenged Children transported from several villages. Need financial support to transport these children.  Formation Of JLG groups supported by NABARD Bank, SHGs Development Programs, Education, Vocational Training, Tribal Development, Health Service, Disability, Women Empowerment, Community Development Programs: Global warming, Environment, Rain Water harvesting, Child Labour, Women Rights, organic farming and Herbal Plantation. The trust needs funding for the above mentioned programs
